languages.text: "Ты и твоя семья должны быть готовы к тому, что такое повторится снова".

traits.locale_text: "Ты и твоя семья должны быть готовы к тому, что такое повторится снова".

languages.text: "You and your family must be prepared for the next time something like this happens."
languages.original_text: "Ты и твоя семья должны быть готовы к тому, что такое повторится снова".

traits.locale_text: "You and your family have to be prepared for it to happen again."
"You and your family have to be prepared for it to happen again."
"You and your family have to be prepared for it to happen again."
"You and your family have to be prepared for it to happen again."
"You and your family must be prepared for the next time something like this happens."
"You and your family must be prepared for the next time something like this happens."

languages.text: 「あなたとその家族は、再びこのようなことが起きる時に備えるべきだ」
languages.original_text: "You and your family must be prepared for the next time something like this happens."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたとその家族は、再びこのようなことが起きる時に備えるべきだ」

languages.text: “你和你的族人都应该做好准备，以免今后再发生类似的事情。”
languages.original_text: "You and your family must be prepared for the next time something like this happens."

traits.locale_text: “你和你的族人都应该做好准备，以免重蹈覆辙。”

languages.text: « Ce n'est probablement pas la dernière fois que votre famille et vous devrez faire face à un tel incident. Vous devriez vous y préparer. »
languages.original_text: "You and your family must be prepared for the next time something like this happens."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est certainement pas la dernière fois que votre famille et vous devrez faire face à un tel incident. »

languages.text: «Tanto usted como su familia tienen que estar preparados para la próxima vez que ocurra algo similar».
languages.original_text: "You and your family must be prepared for the next time something like this happens."

traits.locale_text: «Tanto usted como su familia tienen que estar preparados para que vuelva a pasar».

languages.text: "Ihr und Eure Familie müsst vorbereitet sein, wenn so etwas das nächste Mal geschieht."
languages.original_text: "You and your family must be prepared for the next time something like this happens."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr und Eure Familie müsst darauf vorbereitet sein, dass das erneut geschieht."

languages.text: "Hanen ve sen, böyle bir hadisenin tekrarı hâlinde hazır olmalısınız."
languages.original_text: "You and your family must be prepared for the next time something like this happens."

traits.locale_text: "Hanen ve sen, böyle bir hadisenin tekrarı hâlinde hazır olmalısınız."
